item.title: Distill
item.description: Distill is a package built for R Markdown, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. The goal of the Distill package is to provide an output format optimized for online scientific and technical communication. You may install it from CRAN: install.packages("distill") In this workshop, we’ll also use the postcards package to generate a nice “about” page for your distill website. You may also install it from CRAN:

item.title: Blogdown
item.description: The goal of the blogdown package is to provide a powerful and infinitely customizable website output format for R Markdown. You may install it from CRAN: install.packages("blogdown") Additional resources Up & running with blogdown in 2021 Unbreak your blogdown site A spoonful of Hugo series
